purpose: Ulm University, Germany, is announcing an open position for an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering, with a deadline for applications set for June 29, 2025. The university seeks a candidate with an international track record in software engineering to enhance research and teaching in practical computer science. The position offers opportunities for interdisciplinary collaboration and includes support for a doctoral student position. The university encourages qualified female scientists to apply and provides details for the application process.
evidence_sentences: Ulm University, Germany, is looking to hire an Assistant Professor of Software Engineering.

We are seeking an exceptional candidate with an international track record in the field of software engineering to strengthen the area of practical computer science at Ulm University with respect to research and teaching.
An E13 doctoral student position is available to support the assistant professor.
The University is seeking to increase the proportion of women in research and teaching and particularly encourage qualified female scientists to apply for this position.
